title: Unable to log in to the portal
description: Getting an 'Invalid Credentials' error despite using the correct password. The password reset link is also not arriving in my email.

title: Dashboard analytics are loading very slowly
description: The main dashboard takes more than 20 seconds to load all the charts. This issue started happening yesterday.

title: Export to CSV feature is failing
description: When I try to export the monthly report, I get a 500 server error page. This is critical for our monthly review.

title: Minor typo on the pricing page
description: There is a spelling mistake in the description of the 'Enterprise' plan. It should be 'comprehensive' not 'comprehenisve'.

title: Mobile app crashes when opening messages
description: The iOS application closes immediately when I tap on the messages tab. I am using the latest version of the app.

title: Cannot update my shipping address
description: The system shows a success message after I save the new address. However, the old address is still displayed on my profile.

title: Incorrect tax calculation on invoices
description: The final invoice total is showing an incorrect tax amount. It seems to be calculating at 10% instead of the required 8%.

title: Email notifications are being delayed
description: I am not receiving email notifications for alerts in real-time. There is usually a delay of 15-20 minutes.

title: Search filter by date is not working
description: When I filter transactions using a specific date range, the results are empty. I am certain there were transactions on those dates.

title: Request to add a 'dark mode' theme
description: The current user interface is very bright. A 'dark mode' option would be great for reducing eye strain.
